LongDescription: Heavy civilian drive for cargo vessels, hastily reinforced when commandeered.
FlavorText:
OSPN NAVY-LINK COMM.
T: OSPN ULTRAMAX
F: OSPN UNSPOKEN PHILOSOPHY

Barry, it's Mila- the guy from Group 1 propulsion. I'm sending a quick message for you to pass on to Reed; the togglelock idea for the driveline worked out fantastic, one pull and it completely vents all the waste heat. It turns the drivebay into a sauna and everybody starts sweating buckets but I think we managed to completely eliminate the reactor overdraw when the drive gets put out of sync- or at least, mitigated it.

Vogt-Jager tried to do this with the radiation force mitigation thing or whatever the hell they called it but they always liked their 'lowest bidder' contracting, so of course it was up to Bulwark to fix it up. Shame they didn't think of this sooner. I sent the design to Koning and she's going to try to pass it on to Command Engineering, maybe we'll get everybody using these. Sorry for the ramble, I know you don't care, I'm just really satisfied and need someone to talk to.

By the way, Reed uses a false sleeve on his right jacket arm when we're playing cards. If you see him bring it under the table, he's absolutely drawing out an ace. Just a heads up.
